word: NOW THE LORD SAYS NOT TO LET IT COME IN. I BELIEVE THIS BOARD AND THE MANAGEMENT HERE IS A GUARD TO PROTECT ONE WHO DOES NOT KNOW ENOUGH NOT TO HAVE IT COME IN. YOU ARE NOT TO TAKE CONTROL OF A BOOK FROM AN AUTHOR WHO DOES NOT KNOW ENOUGH NOT TO SURRENDER IT ALL TO SOMEBODY ELSE. FOR THE LORD SAYS THAT YOU ARE NOT TO LET ANY PLANS OR METHODS BE BROUGHT INTO THE INSTITUTION THAT WILL DO SUCH A THING.
